mainText: Semero felt a chill run down his spine at menacing tone in wizard's voice. He looked around, his eyes searching for any sign of Austin, but man was nowhere to be seen.
talkOption: Desperately, he turned back to wizard and asked, "Where is Austin?"
talkOptionResult: But instead of an answer, he was met with wizard's bared teeth as he jumped up and grabbed Semero by shirt. "Austin left!" he snarled. "And I'll leave! And you, if you want to save Arvanka, you must give me your face!"
